title: 7 x T202 End Panels w/HoF Wallace $36 shipped
author: david_l

posts.post_title: 7 x T202 End Panels w/HoF Wallace $36 shipped
posts.post_content:
Now for sale as opposed to just trade..

Seven T202 end-panels. $36 shipped in a plain white envelope (and F/F PayPal). Slightly more $$ if you'd like more than those basic services.

I have the following T202 end panel dupes that I'm willing to trade for T202 panels or T206 beaters that I don't have. 

Conditions vary.  Let me know if you need a better pics or descriptions. 

Birmingham, Delehanty, Kling, Overall, Phillipe, Stanage (trimmed-not pictured), Wallace (no cap - heavy creasing).

I have lots of good references that I can point you to. Price is firm.

-David
